```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(gt)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r load-data}
data <- read_excel("your_file.xls", sheet = 1)

# Show first few rows
head(data)
```


```{r demographics-table}
summary_df <- data %>%
  group_by(CategoryColumn) %>%
  summarise(
    Count = n(),
    MeanValue = mean(NumericColumn, na.rm = TRUE),
    .groups = "drop"
  )

summary_df %>%
  gt() %>%
  tab_header(
    title = "Summary Table",
    subtitle = "Grouped Summary from Excel File"
  )
  ```
